philosophy.short: Momentum comes from alternating activations, not waiting.
philosophy.long: Rounds organize time, but momentum comes from who acts and who reacts. The battlefield evolves even if players hesitate.
philosophy.design_intent: Monsters press the attack; Humans react, reposition, and survive. Coffin Canyon does not reward waiting.

initiative_logic.short: Monsters activate first unless the scenario says otherwise.
initiative_logic.long: Monster Factions always activate first. If both sides are Monsters, roll 1d6; high roll chooses. Initiative remains fixed for the game unless scenario-dictated.
initiative_logic.first_activation: Monster Factions always activate first. If both sides are Monsters, 1d6 high roll chooses.
initiative_logic.thematic_reason: The Canyon favors monsters and the unnatural pressure they bring.

activation_cycle.short: Players alternate activating one model at a time.
activation_cycle.long: Activations alternate between players, one model at a time, until all models have activated once.
activation_cycle.format: Alternating Activations (1 model at a time).
rules: One player activates, then the opponent activates.
Continue until all models have acted once.
Models cannot activate twice in a round unless explicitly allowed.

the_activation.short: Each model gets two actions per activation.
the_activation.long: Each model receives two actions per activation. Actions may be repeated or mixed unless restricted.
the_activation.action_economy: Each model receives 2 Actions per activation.
the_activation.flexibility: May be two different actions or the same action twice, in any order.

reactions.definition: Abilities triggered outside a model's activation.
reactions.logic: Must be explicitly listed as a Reaction; otherwise, it is not one.

round_definition.short: A round ends once all models have activated.
round_definition.long: A round is complete once all models on both sides have activated once.
round_definition.completion: Occurs when all models on both sides have activated once.
maintenance_steps: Resolve terrain escalation (Burning, Unstable collapse, etc.)
round_definition.reset: Begin next round immediately. No new initiative roll is made.

action_summaries.move: Measure from base. Speed capped by Move value. Terrain affects speed. Movement can be split by other actions.
action_summaries.attack: Requires an Action. Uses the Quality system. Usually requires Line of Sight.
